message.entry: Only string, numeric, or RandStream arguments are allowed.
An input signal must be given.
The input signal must have 2 or fewer dimensions.
The signal power mode must be ''db'' or ''linear''.
The signal-to-noise ratio must be a real scalar.
In linear mode, the signal-to-noise ratio must be > 0.
In linear mode, the signal power must be >= 0.
The signal power parameter must be numeric or ''measured''.
The signal power value must be a real scalar.
